text.p: Cape Africa - (built 1991) 149,533 dwt 13 on 45 plus two del Kaohsiung mid September trip via NSW redel UK $9,000 daily British Steel.
Pacific Prospect - (built 1993) 73,360 dwt 14 on 32 del USNH 7-14/8 September two to four months redel Atlantic $8,600/$8,650 daily plus $100,000 bb Docenave.
Albacore - (built 1977) 71,730 dwt 14 on 32 plus 1.5 del Hay Point 1-5/9 two to three loaded legs redel At;antic $3,750 first forty days $7,500 daily for balance Docenave.
Sun P - (built 1981) 65,738 dwt 14 on 39 del Vlaardingen spot trip via Aaheim 7-10 days redel Rotterdam $8,350 daily B. Skaugen.
Atlantic Statesman - 65,015 dwt 14 on 39 plus one del USG 2-20/9 trip redel Taiwan $11,000 daily plus $150,000 bb K Line.
Noble Fortune - (built 1974) 64,173 dwt 13 on 32 plus 2.5 del North China spot/prompt trip via Qinhuangdao redel South Korea approx. $5,000 daily Yukong (amended).
Waimea - (built 1984) 61,751 dwt 14 on 35.5 plus two del passing Skaw prompt trip via St Lawrence redel Egyptian Med $6,800 daily NNC.
